description: Impose changing emissions of RCP3.4 overshoot short lived gas species including CH4, NOx, VOCs and CO.  Beginning in 2040, reduce forcings from 8.5 W/m2 pathway to 3.4 W/m2 by 2100.
name: RCP34-overshoot Short Lived Gas Species
rationale: Represents an overshoot scenario that considers the implications of rapid decarbonization from SSP5-8.5 beginning in 2040.
longName: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4 Overshoot Short Lived Gas Species
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4 overshoot, future, scenario, SSP5, RCP3.4, overshoot, NTCF, Short-lived Gas
